languages.text: Поверхность стелы кипит мелкими омерзительными пузырьками, будто пытается изрыгнуть себя в какой-то новой форме.
The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.
languages.original_text: Поверхность стелы кипит мелкими омерзительными пузырьками, будто пытается изрыгнуть себя в какой-то новой форме.

traits.locale_text: The surface of the stele is boiling with the gross bubbles, as if it is trying to belch itself into some new form.
The surface of the stele is boiling with the gross bubbles, as if it is trying to belch itself into some new form.
The surface of the stele is boiling with gross teensy bubbles, as if it were trying to belch itself into some new form.
The surface of the stele is boiling with gross teensy bubbles, as if it were trying to belch itself into some new form.
The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.
The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.

languages.text: De petites bulles répugnantes bouillonnent à la surface de la stèle, comme si cette dernière tentait de régurgiter une nouvelle forme.
languages.original_text: The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.

traits.locale_text: De petites bulles répugnantes bouillonnent à la surface de la stèle, comme si cette dernière tentait d'adopter une nouvelle forme.

languages.text: La superficie de la estela hierve con unas burbujas repugnantes, como si intentara vomitar para cambiar de forma.
languages.original_text: The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.

traits.locale_text: La superficie de la estela hierve con unas burbujas diminutas y nauseabundas, como si intentara eructar para cambiar de forma.

languages.text: 石碑的表面沸腾着令人厌恶的气泡，就好像这个石碑本身在一边打嗝，一边变形。
languages.original_text: The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.

traits.locale_text: 石碑的表面沸腾着大大小小的气泡，就好像这个石碑本身在一边打嗝，一边变形。

languages.text: 碑の表面は、まるで何か新しい形へと自らを吐き出そうとしているかのように不気味な形をしてうごめいている。
languages.original_text: The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.

traits.locale_text: 碑の表面は、まるで何か新しい形へと自らを吐き出そうとしているかのように不気味な形をしてうごめいている。

languages.text: Auf der Oberfläche der Stele brodeln widerliche Bläschen, als würde sie versuchen, sich selbst in neuer Gestalt auszuspucken.
languages.original_text: The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.

traits.locale_text: Auf der Oberfläche der Stele brodeln winzige, widerliche Bläschen, als würde sie versuchen, sich selbst in eine neue Gestalt zu rülpsen.

languages.text: Stelin yüzeyi, âdeta kendini farklı bir şeye dönüştürmeye çalışıyormuş gibi gözüken iğrenç baloncuklarla kaynıyor.
languages.original_text: The surface of the stele is roiling with revolting bubbles, as if it is trying to disgorge itself into some new form.
